review_title: great place to work as a starting nurse
pros: as a new nurse you get to still see many things and learn a great place to build your skills and others are very helpful
cons: not much cons other than some unexpected call offs but it’s not as frequent as other places i’m use too

pros: great benefits and security. competitive wages

pros: The sweet residents, the hours were great.
cons: Their current team of head chef/manager and supervisors are condescending, sexist, & ageist towards their peers. I’d seen a few too many time they talk in a tone and manner with younger employees like children or as if they’re less intelligent. I’ve seen them bully and antagonize a fellow coworker instead of “managing” her because they didn’t like the way she worked.

pros:
- Competitive pay
- Great benefits
- A lot of opportunity for OT
- Easy-going work environment
Company provides competitive compensation for this industry in this area.

Great benefits: 403B, health insurance, scholarship opportunities 
Opportunities to grow within the company
Inviting community between both residents and partners
Many different jobs offered throughout the 3 campuses
Fun activities to participate in: community benefit walks, holiday events, bocce tournaments, variety shows, etc.
cons: No cons to give here. Excellent company/community to work for.

pros: Moorings Park is a great company to work for. They have excellent benefits.

job_title: New Graduate Registered Nurse in Naples, FL
pros: Kind and understanding staff who actually care about employees
cons: Can’t think of any cons yet honestly

pros: Starting pay was great. Still received starting pay after 3rd year.
cons: Need improvements in Lower Level Management. LLM is lacking in leadership characteristics. Most set double standards and refuse suggestion regarding daily operation. Lots of empty promises. You will receive PUBLIC REPRIMANDS.

pros: I have had the honor to work for Moorings Park over the last 11 years. I started in my career at Moorings Park right out of college. Over the years they have grown me professionally and because of that I have been able to advance within the company. I can truly say that Moorings Park has my best interest, places their employees first and focuses on growth and other career development opportunities through the partner experience.
cons: I have none at this time.

review_title: Simply the Best place I've ever worked!
job_title: Talent Acquisition Specialist in Naples, FL
pros: Kind and welcoming coworkers. Incredible benefits including scholarship opportunities for partners and their children and grandchildren, health insurance, generous PTO, flexible work schedule for many positions, discounts on food, free access to on site fitness center, work-life balance, generous matching on 403b, wellness plan and more!
cons: Really hard to think of any cons. They really try to customize your work experience to match whatever needs you are experiencing at the present time.

pros: Competitive health, dental and vision plans. HSA, FSA and 501K (equivalent). Scholarships, tuition reimbursement, and development programs.
cons: Career advancement  is restricted specially in the healthcare side of the business. Medical practice outsourced with NCH.

pros: Thoughtful management team that truly cares about employees which has been demonstrated through the pandemic. Also, one of the most financially stable organizations in the country. The fact that there are 3 communities provides employees with career growth opportunities.
cons: I really can't think of any.

pros: Flexible hours and room for growth.
